title: "League of Legends unexpectedly shut down" Mac issue
body:
I just started playing again after a 2 months break. I downloaded the patches and tried going into a game. Loading screen comes up and then it shuts down and gives me the message "League of Legends unexpectedly shut down". What do I do :i

Edit: No game modes work for me. I get the same message everytime

replies.body:
Hey Customer Support, 

If this has been a continuous issue and you can't get back in the game, it would be best to reach out to Riot Support. There you will be able to get one on one help from a specialist. 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Really hope to see you back in the game :) 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
